txt_en: Play a trick, share the joy, and lighten the load!
txt_cn: 玩笑开起来，欢乐传出去，压力退退退！

txt_en: Roots dig deeper in dark soil.
txt_cn: 泥土愈晦暗，根茎愈深劲。

txt_en: Stars aren't afraid to glow in the dark.
The departed are like the wind—invisible, yet forever brushing against our memories.
txt_cn: 逝者如风，无形却永拂记忆。

txt_en: Dig deeper than doubt; treasure lies beneath.
Storms write symphonies on broken cliffs.
txt_cn: 风暴在残崖上谱写乐章。

txt_en: To carry fire is to be the light.
Tomorrow is a blank page. You hold the pen.
txt_cn: 明天是未知的篇章，但由你执笔书写。

txt_en: Scars are the map where courage was written.
txt_cn: 伤痕是勇气的篆刻之图。

txt_en: Your voice is the compass when stars go mute.
txt_cn: 失去了星辰的指引，你的心就是方向。
